item.title: Media Effect Estimation with PyMC: Adstock, Saturation & Diminishing Returns
item.description: In this notebook we present a concrete example of estimating the media effects via bayesian methods, following the strategy outlined in Google’s paper Jin, Yuxue, et al. “Bayesian methods for media mix modeling with carryover and shape effects.” (2017). This example can be considered the continuation of the post Media Effect Estimation with Orbit’s KTR Model. However, it is not strictly necessary to read before as we make this notebook self-contained.
